metadata.inclusion:
- Click [Add] icon in Z-Wave PC Controller Program
- Press a Func_Button 1 time in SHP-SB100Z (Door Sensor)
- If Inclusion Process is successful, LED is Blinking 3 times in 
 SHP-SB100Z
metadata.exclusion:
- Click [Remove] icon in Z-Wave PC Controller Program
- Press a Func_Button 3 times quickly in SHP-SB100Z
- If Exclusion Process is successful, LED is Blinking 5 times in 
 SHP-SB100Z
metadata.reset:
Device Factory Reset
- Use this procedure only when he network primary controller is missing
 or otherwise inoperable 
- Press a Func_Button for 10 seconds in SHP-SB100Z
- If Factory Reset Process is successful, LED is Blinking 1 time in SHP-SB100Z 
- Device Reset Locally notification is Transmitted
